channel.title: CVE Feed for octoprint -- octoprint/octoprint
channel.description: The latest CVEs for octoprint -- octoprint/octoprint

item.title: CVE-2022-2822|2024-08-03T00:52:58.435Z -- octoprint -- octoprint%2Foctoprint
item.description: An attacker can freely brute force username and password and can takeover any account. An attacker could easily guess user passwords and gain access to user and administrative accounts.

item.title: CVE-2022-2930|2024-08-03T00:53:00.455Z -- octoprint -- octoprint%2Foctoprint
item.description: Unverified Password Change in GitHub repository octoprint/octoprint prior to 1.8.3.

item.title: CVE-2022-2888|2024-08-03T00:52:59.606Z -- octoprint -- octoprint%2Foctoprint
item.description: If an attacker comes into the possession of a victim's OctoPrint session cookie through whatever means, the attacker can use this cookie to authenticate as long as the victim's account exists.

item.title: CVE-2022-3607|2024-08-03T01:14:03.306Z -- octoprint -- octoprint%2Foctoprint
item.description: Failure to Sanitize Special Elements into a Different Plane (Special Element Injection) in GitHub repository octoprint/octoprint prior to 1.8.3.

item.title: CVE-2022-2872|2024-08-03T00:52:58.717Z -- octoprint -- octoprint%2Foctoprint
item.description: Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type in GitHub repository octoprint/octoprint prior to 1.8.3.

item.title: CVE-2022-3068|2024-08-03T01:00:10.462Z -- octoprint -- octoprint%2Foctoprint
item.description: Improper Privilege Management in GitHub repository octoprint/octoprint prior to 1.8.3.
